Body:
"""
        Sorting by multiple fields in descending order should work
        """
view = ReversedSortingMultipleFieldsFlatView.as_view()
request = factory.get('/')
with self.assertNumQueries(2):
    response = view(request).render()
self.assertEqual(len(response.data), 6)
self.assertEqual(response.data, sorted(sorted(self.sorted_results_w_author,
    key=lambda x: x['title']), key=lambda x: x['type'], reverse=True))
